summary: When a clown dies, his small son forms a circus act with an escaped convict. The latter falls in love with the amusement park owner.
cast: John Lupton|Michael McGreevey|Don Keefer|Mary Webster|Barry Kelley|Edith Evanson|Ken Mayer|Peggy Stewart|James Parnell|Charles G. Martin|Mary Adams|Victor French
title: The Clown and the Kid
